s: Kosmatology is an affordable organic skincare line for the entire family. Kosmatology was created by Dr. Janis Covey, a compounding pharmacist who wanted cleaner options for her family. The formulations are simple yet effective.

s: Online shopping from a great selection at Kosmatology Store.
Kosmatology is an organic skincare line created by Dr. Janis Covey, pharmacist and mom to offer natural, affordable, and non-toxic products for families.

This isn’t your typical body wash. Containing eight ingredients or less, they are great for every skin type. Free & Clear (Unscented) for those with super sensitive skin, Goody-Goody Grapefruit for itchy eczema-like skin and Herbal Fresh (Spearmint-Rosemary) for those who need to be energized ...
